description: Scramble.io UI components made with React and Browserify

scripts.start: npm run copy && watchify -t [reactify --harmony] jsx/*.jsx -o build/app.js & http-server build/
scripts.prepublish: npm run copy && browserify -t [reactify --harmony] jsx/*.jsx -o build/app.js
scripts.copy: mkdir -p build && cp index.html build/ && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css build/
